enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Cipriano Cassama, Secretary of State for the Environment, said that international cooperation must be the foundation for sustainable development.
Guinea Bissau will take an active part in the future work of the COP.
GUINEA: Dorank Assifat Diasseny, Minister of Energy and the Environment, appealed for the mobilization of all Parties so that future generations will be proud.
Industrialized countries must show international solidarity.
IRELAND: Brendan Howlin, Minister for the Environment, stressed the development of alternative energy sources.
CZECH REPUBLIC: Frantisek Benda, Minister of the Environment, supported international cooperation and said JI could produce implementation policies and measures.
